about.title: About me
about.about: Hello, my name is Alessandro Fernandez Medrano, but you know me as Aria, I'm 18 years old and I'm from Moyobamba - Peru, I'm studying Web development at Academlo so that in the future I'll work in the field with recognized companies and form a good profile as Web Dev.

experience.title: Education
experience.careerOne: Career: Business administration, faculty of Administrative Sciences
experience.careerTwo: Full Stack Web Development and Computer Science

portfolio.pyoyect_one_description: Create an account, search for users, start conversations and talk to all of them within this application.

portfolio.pyoyect_three_description: Create user cards by entering their data, delete them and edit them as you like!
